definitions.definition: The person who makes a telephone call .
examples: ―I’ve got someone on the line. ―Who’s the caller ?

definitions.definition: The person who stands at the front of the hall and announces the numbers.
A function that calls another (the callee ).
examples: If the called function throws an exception , the caller should be prepared to handle the error.

definitions.definition: A whistle or similar item used to call foxes .
The person who directs dancers in certain dances , such as American line dances and square dances .

main_definition: ( telephony ) The person who makes a telephone call .
secondary_definitions: ( bingo ) The person who stands at the front of the hall and announces the numbers.
( programming ) A function that calls another (the callee ).
A whistle or similar item used to call foxes .
( dance ) The person who directs dancers in certain dances , such as American line dances and square dances .
